mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.lajixinxi_id as lajixinxiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.lajixinxi_liuyan_text as lajixinxiLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,lajixinxi.lajixinxi_name as lajixinxiName ,lajixinxi.lajixinxi_types as lajixinxiTypes ,lajixinxi.lajixinxi_photo as lajixinxiPhoto ,lajixinxi.lajixinxi_click_number as lajixinxiClickNumber ,lajixinxi.lajixinxi_content as lajixinxiContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM lajixinxi_liuyan a left JOIN lajixinxi lajixinxi ON a.lajixinxi_id = lajixinxi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.lajixinxi_id = #{params.lajixinxiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.lajixinxi_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.lajixinxiLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.lajixinxi_id IS NOT NULL
and lajixinxi.lajixinxi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.lajixinxiName},'%')
and lajixinxi.lajixinxi_types = #{params.lajixinxiTypes}
and lajixinxi.lajixinxi_click_number >= #{params.lajixinxiClickNumberStart}
and lajixinxi.lajixinxi_click_number <= #{params.lajixinxiClickNumberEnd}
and lajixinxi.lajixinxi_click_number = #{params.lajixinxiClickNumber}
and lajixinxi.lajixinxi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.lajixinxiContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
